title: This accessible floorplan includes convenient handrails
posting_body: ['Welcome to Walden Brook', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$1455/Month | 1', 'Bedroom 1 Bath | 916 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Apartment Amenities', '− Carpet', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Handrails', '− Office', '− Oven', '− Pantry', '− Patio or Balcony', '− Refrigerator/Freezer', '− Sprinkler System', '− Built in computer niches', '− Contemporary floor plans', '− Crown Molding', '− Fully equipped modern kitchens', '− Hardwood Floors', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Large walk-in closets', '− Recreation Room', '− Storage Space', '− Upgrade Unit', 'Community Features', '− Clubhouse', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Gameroom', '− Gated entry', '− Laundry Facility', '− Maintenance on site', '− Multi Use Room', '− Playground', '− Porch', '− Controlled Access', '− Detached garages', '− Lake view', '− Online Services', '− Package Service', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Public Transportation', '− Sundeck', '− Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'About Community', 'Description:', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Location:', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AB126FF1458D4D']
